title: Optoma ZF2300GLASSES Active Shutter Rechargeable 3D RF Glasses (One Size Fits All)
feature: Easy to use - always in sync, with no line-of-sight required - the ZF2300 glasses display clear, bright 3D images with high contrast
Stylish, lightweight, foldable design - just 1.38 oz - the ZF2300 glasses are more than one size fits all, they also fit over prescription glasses
Compatibility: all Optoma projectors with 3D VESA port
Optoma BC300 emitter is sold separately (not bundled together)
Optoma ZF2300 glasses are compatible with BC300 emitters only; they are NOT compatible with the older generation RF emitters
description: Developed in parallel with Optoma's "Full 3D" video projectors, the ZF2300 system is optimized to provide higher contrast & brighter images than ever before. Using RF (radio frequency) technology, the ZF2300 system is easy to install in the same room as the projector and eliminates line-of-site issues commonly found with IR based 3D glasses systems. Compatible with all Optoma projectors with 3D VESA port. What's in the Box: ZF2300 glasses, soft carry case, cleaning cloth, USB charging cable, 2x nose piece. Rechargeable Battery: Lithium Polymer - up to 25 hours use!
